thread.title: JAL Group announces traffic results for 2015 summer vacation period
thread.title_full: JAL Group announces traffic results for 2015 summer vacation period

author: eTN Global Editor
title: JAL Group announces traffic results for 2015 summer vacation period
text:
JAL Group announces traffic results for 2015 summer vacation period   
Aug 17, 2015 eTN   
TOKYO, Japan - JAL Group (JAL) today announced passenger traffic results for the Japanese summer vacation period that spanned from August 7 to August 16, 2015. JAL carried a total of 274,429 passengers on its international flights during the 10-day stretch, and a total of 1,077,553 passengers domestically. 
With 1.6% less seats offered on international routes this year, the number of passengers carried by JAL to and from overseas rose 1.7%, leading to raise the seat load factor 2.9 points to 91.6% compared to the same period last year. JAL also operated a total of eight extra flights to destinations in Hawaii, and two chartered flights to Hawaii during this peak season. 
Domestically, the number of passengers increased 3.8% in comparison to the same period last year. The overall load factor rose by approx. 2.3 percentage points to 77.9%. JAL also operated 44 extra flights, mainly to popular destinations like Okinawa and Sapporo during this summer vacation. 
2015 Summer Vacation Period: Passenger Traffic Results 
JAL Group International Traffic Result August 7 - August 16, 2015 JAL Change on 2014 (%) Passenger Total Pax Change on 2014 (%) Seat Load factor (%) 
Transpacific 17.9 36,180 18.2 92.9 Europe 1.3 25,462 2.9 95.0 S.E. Asia -2.0 63,713 5.2 91.1 Oceania 3.3 5,172 4.4 91.9 China -7.9 58,332 -1.0 91.8 South Korea -17.5 22,931 -16.0 90.3 Taiwan -0.8 27,004 0.1 90.3 Hawaii 3.8 31,268 -0.8 90.3 Guam 0.3 4,367 -0.8 92.1 TOTAL -1.6 274,429 1.7 91.6 
JAL Group Domestic Traffic Result August 7 - August 16, 2015 Available Seat Change on 2014 (%) Passenger Total Pax Change on 2014 (%) Seat load factor % 
JAL/J-AIR 1.1 920,827 4.3 78.4 JTA -5.0 88,394 -1.2 84.0 RAC -7.8 12,223 -5.0 79.4 JAC 4.4 51,189 6.2 64.5 HAC 0.7 4,920 1.3 62.8 TOTAL 0.1 1,077,553 3.8 77.9
